meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Coke Settles Bias Case Coca-Cola said it had tentatively reached a settlement with black employees who contended they were victims of discrimination.
Lakers Take 3-1 Edge Los Angeles moved within a game of the N.B.A. title, beating Indiana 120-118 in overtime. Next game: tomorrow.
Coke Settles Bias Case Coca-Cola said it had tentatively reached a settlement with black employees who contended they were victims of discrimination.
Lakers Take 3-1 Edge Los Angeles moved within a game of the N.B.A. title, beating Indiana 120-118 in overtime. Next game: tomorrow.
E-Signature Bill Passed The House passed an electronic-signature bill that proponents say will move electronic commerce to a new level.
Devils Party, Jersey Style Devils' fans celebrate the Stanley Cup with a family-style party on acres of asphalt, but it's a setting they know and love.
